Models

Product Models

Models for the Products app.

exception DoesNotExist

class apps.products.models.product_models.Category(*args, **kwargs)

Category of a product.

The database table generated from this class makes uses of the django-treebeard nested set model for a hierachical organisation of objects such that categories may have parent and/or children categories.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
get_absolute_url()

Return a URL for the Category.

Returns:
str: URL for the

:py:model:`~apps.products.product_models.Category`.

get_ancestors_and_self()

Return list with current Category and its ancestors. Use django-treebeard’s get_ancestors if you don’t want to include the current Category. itself.

Returns:

list: List with current Category and its ancestors.

get_descendants_and_self()

Return list with current Category and its descendants. Use django-treebeard’s get_ancestors if you don’t want to include the current Category. itself.

Returns:
list: List with current

Category and its descendants.

class apps.products.models.product_models.ProductVariant(*args, **kwargs)

Variant of a particular product.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
clean()

Validates :py:model:`~apps.products.product_models.ProductVariant` model.

This method performs the following:

  1. Checks that if both are specified, there is no conflict

between the discounted_price and the percentage_discount attribute values.

  1. Checks that

discounted_price is not greater or equal to selling_price

Raises:
ValidationError: If there is a conflict between

discounted_price and percentage_discount

ValidationError: If

discounted_price is greater or equal to selling_price

Note:

If discounted_price is 0, it is considered to be blank.

save(*args, **kwargs)

Overrides the :py:model:`~apps.products.product_models.ProductVariant` save method to perform additional routines.

This method performs the following:

  1. Populates either apps.products.product_models.ProductVariant.discounted_price or apps.products.product_models.ProductVariant.percentage_discount if one of the attributes is blank while the other is not. The blank attribute is populated based on the value of the populated one.

Warning:

A apps.products.product_models.ProductVariant.discounted_price of value 0 is considered None.

class apps.products.models.product_models.Supplier(*args, **kwargs)

Supplier of a product variant.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
class apps.products.models.product_models.Tag(*args, **kwargs)

Tag for a product.

Tags are to be used in recommendation and search engines within the shop.

Comment:

Products have a one to many relationship with tags. A many to many relationship was also an option; however, creation of tags is to be done using an inline in the ProductAdmin and many to many relationships do not allow for object creation.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
save(*args, **kwargs)

Overrides the :py:model:`~apps.products.product_models.Tag` save.

This method converts all characters in name to lowercase.

Image Models

Models for images associated with models in the products app.

class apps.products.models.image_models.ProductImage(*args, **kwargs)

Image of a :py:model:`~apps.products.models.product_models.Product`.

This is used only on the thumbnails for the :py:model:`~apps.products.models.product_models.Product` and in the case where images of a :py:model:`~apps.products.models.product_models.ProductVariant` are not added.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
